name: Rebel Friend
content:
Rebel Friend was a human affiliated with the Alliance to Restore the Republic who had light skin and black eyes and wore red-and-black clothing along with a black-and-white helmet and chin strap.
Rebel Friend was reintroduced to the new Star Wars canon in the non-canon video game LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga, which was released on April 5, 2022. Rebel Friend's name was revealed in a tweet by the official account of the game on March 28 of that year. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Rebel Friend was created for the non-canon video game LEGO Star Wars II: The Original Trilogy.
